name: Connective DX
description:
Connective DX is a digital experience agency that helps organizations embrace the power of digital, align around the customer, and take control of their future. We partner with our clients to see their business from the outside in, and we build that insight into the systems we develop and stories we tell.Â 
Founded in 1997, Connective DX serves organizations globally from our offices in Portland, OR and Boston, MA.
